pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, met today with the Prime Minister of Japan, Shinzo Abe, in advance of the Nuclear Security Summit in Washington, D.C.

Building on their previous meetings, the two leaders discussed the agenda of the upcoming G7 Summit, which will take place in Ise-Shima, Japan on May 26-27, 2016.

They also exchanged views on a range of other issues of mutual interest, including trade and investment, infrastructure, science and technology, as well as regional and international peace and security.
